name: Apple iPhone 13
description: Apple iPhone 13 with A15 Bionic chip, 5.4-inch Super Retina XDR display.
details: The iPhone 13 from Apple boasts the powerful A15 Bionic chip, offering exceptional performance and energy efficiency. It also features a 5.4-inch Super Retina XDR display for crystal clear visuals, 5G capability, a dual-camera system for stunning photos and videos, and a long-lasting battery life.

name: Samsung Galaxy S22
description: Samsung Galaxy S22 with Exynos 2200, 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X.
details: The Samsung Galaxy S22 is a feature-packed smartphone with Samsung's own Exynos 2200 chip. It offers a stunning 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, 5G connectivity, a high-quality camera system with advanced features like Single Take, and a long-lasting, fast-charging battery.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: Dell XPS 13 Laptop with Intel i7, 13.4-inch 4K display.
details: The Dell XPS 13 is a premium laptop that features an Intel i7 processor for impressive performance, a 13.4-inch 4K display for incredible detail, and a sleek, portable design. It also comes with a large SSD for fast data access and storage, Thunderbolt ports for connecting high-speed peripherals, and a long-lasting battery for extended use on the go.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
description: Sony PlayStation 5 Console with Ultra-High Speed SSD, Ray Tracing, 4K-TV Gaming.
details: The Sony PlayStation 5 is a powerful gaming console with an ultra-high speed SSD for faster load times, ray tracing for realistic lighting, and support for 4K-TV gaming. It also features a custom CPU and GPU for high-fidelity graphics, 3D audio for an immersive gaming experience, and backward compatibility with PlayStation 4 games.

name: Bose QuietComfort 35
description: Bose QuietComfort 35 Wireless Bluetooth Headphones, Noise-Cancelling.
details: The Bose QuietComfort 35 wireless headphones provide world-class noise cancellation, making quiet sound quieter and music sound better. They're Alexa-enabled for voice access to music, information, and more, and provide balanced audio performance at any volume thanks to volume-optimized EQ. They also offer hassle-free Bluetooth pairing, personalized settings, and access to future updates through the Bose Connect app.
